title: Why this is the most versatile hair cut - whether you're in your 30's or 50's
text:
Last week, Margot Robbie, 29, and Nicole Kidman, 52, hit the US talk show circuit, alongside co-star Charlize Theron, to promote their highly anticipated film Bombshell (due to hit UK cinemas in January) about three female employees at Fox News who take on a toxic male culture.

While there are 23 years between them, both Robbie and Kidman are sporting the same mid-length hair style - right down to the hair parting, length and texture, proving that a darn good haircut is still the smartest way to look ageless. Who needs filler or Botox when you've got the name of a top celebrity hairdresser?

Sitting a few inches below the shoulder with no blunt fringe or obvious layers to speak of, while this...
description: Last week, Margot Robbie, 29, and Nicole Kidman, 52, hit the US talk show circuit, alongside co-star Charlize Theron, to promote their highly anticipated film Bombshell (due to hit UK cinemas in January) about three female employees at Fox News who take on a toxic male culture.
